website_summaries.verdict: Peppy and fun, with lots of beginner-friendly features that will have users excited about each flight.
pros: Its one-key start and stop makes this battle drone a fast mover
Beginner-friendly features like altitude hold, headless mode, and defeat auto-landing
cons: Battery wire is difficult to connect, and battery can slip, unbalancing the drone

customer_reviews.title: Fun little drones
customer_reviews.text: These are cool! It took me some tries to figure out how to control it well but now that I’ve got it it’s a lot more fun. Do not fly on a windy day- you will lose! I have seen large dragonflies check them out while flying with my boyfriend. The downside is that the battery only lasts about 8 minutes but it is a long 8 minutes when you are flipping and shooting at a partner. Seen pretty durable though my boyfriend smashed his into something one of the first times flying and one of the guards broke off. Comes with extra parts.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly with friends
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying two of these individual units instead of the "combo pack" because it was cheaper. They arrived quickly and setup was easy. They came with two canopies, so I am able to have two different colored drones. Flight control is pretty good. Altitude hold works very well. It works best on rate 1, but has two higher rates. They are very hard to control in a small room on anything but rate 1. The only bad thing about this is that one of the controller sticks gets stuck when rolling full left, but other than that, they work great. The battle part of the drones works very well too. Flight time is decent at around 4 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: P. N.

customer_reviews.title: These seem okay
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old twins have been begging for drones for awhile. I finally caved and bought two of these since they could operate them at the same time. They've had them for two days now and can operate them fairly well, including doing flips. I think we are a ways away from battle mode and full operations, but I fully expected that. One of the prop protectors has already gotten broken, but it seems to run fine without it. I wish there were fewer buttons and they were better marked on functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming477475858483

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product & FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I own many drones/quads and these are by far the ultimate fun. The BEST thing of all is my wife (not a drone fan) is having fun learning to fly & beating me at battles! GREAT product! Very smooth & easy to fly, built tough and can handle crashes, the four "HIT" features are impressive. Playing time is good . played about 3 battles with some free flying as well. Now to see how well these will hold up? My only (minor)negative is the battery connection. Best if you plug it in first then slide it into the unit. Tail stub makes it hard to easily connect.
customer_reviews.author: linnea Holden

customer_reviews.title: Can not control do not waiste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT waisted your money on this product. I bought 4 of these for my nephews and son to play with at Christmas. The drowns do not react to buttons on controls. We had 3 of them just take off and go out of control with adults using them. One just decided to fly in the house and almost hit someone in the face. One flew off into field and we couldn’t stop it but luckily found it. And a third one took off and flew into some pine trees never to be found again! Big time waist in money and very disappointing for kids (aged 11-13).

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun but ..... read the instruction

customer_reviews.title: great product..

customer_reviews.author: R K.

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun

My 9 year old wanted a drone very badly so I thought this one would suffice for his novice skills. To my surprise, he managed to get the hang of it rather quickly. This drone will hover and stay pretty stable with only a little finesse needed on the controller. It's now my son's favorite toy and I've been very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi-Dad

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 and extra batteries, so fun!

More batteries are needed because the flying time is only 7 minutes per charge. So inexpensive and fun, I would not have believed it in such a small package. One thing, the battery connection could be improved as I am afraid my big hands are gonna damage it sooner than later.

customer_reviews.author: Al F.

customer_reviews.title: Mini only in size

It comes with extra parts which will come in handy I am sure. It is great indoors and outdoors. It also has battle mode which is very fun for kids and adults. Even has a light to play with in the dark. All around it was a great purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Battle Drones - FLY & Fight

I contacted the seller and they immediately turned around and sent me a replacement controller. We then proceeded to test the battle drones and see how well they performed. They were GREAT. There was not a problem with the drones identifying the other drone when facing it. You can shoot the other drone from at least 15' away. They are extremely responsive and very few adjustments are need directly out of the box. These are great for learning to fly and then having fun when a friend comes over to fly around too.

An important tip: press both "shoulder" buttons at the same time to turn off the propellers quickly; this is important to do if your quadcopter gets caught in something or lands upside down. I have already recommended this model to several friends.

Overall, I am very happy with this purchase and I would definitely recommend it for a novice like myself.
